Welcome to My Recipe Book

Discover delicious recipes dynamically generated from JSON data. Explore, filter, and find your next favorite dish!

Browse Recipes

Dynamic Recipes

All recipes are dynamically loaded and easy to browse.

Search & Filter

Find recipes by name or ingredient instantly.

Step-by-Step Preparation

Follow the ingredients and preparation instructions for each recipe.

recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta with eggs, parmesan, and bacon.
recipes.preparation: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Mix eggs with parmesan. Combine all together.

recipes.title: Vegetable Soup
recipes.description: A healthy, hearty soup with fresh vegetables.
recipes.preparation: Boil water. Add chopped vegetables. Cook for 25 minutes. Season to taste.

recipes.title: Chocolate Pancakes
recipes.description: Quick dessert pancakes with chocolate or jam.
recipes.preparation: Mix ingredients. Fry pancakes. Serve with chocolate or jam.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with feta, olives, cucumber, and tomatoes.
recipes.preparation: Chop vegetables. Add feta and olives. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle oregano.

recipes.title: Grilled Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy chicken breast marinated in herbs and grilled.
recipes.preparation: Marinate chicken with oil and spices. Grill on medium heat for 6–8 minutes per side.

recipes.title: Avocado Toast
recipes.description: Simple and nutritious toast with avocado and toppings.
recipes.preparation: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast and add toppings.

recipes.title: Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Mexican-style tacos with seasoned beef and vegetables.
recipes.preparation: Cook beef with seasoning. Fill taco shells with meat, veggies, and cheese.

recipes.title: Fruit Smoothie
recipes.description: Healthy smoothie with banana, berries, and yogurt.
recipes.preparation: Blend banana, berries, yogurt, and honey until smooth. Serve chilled.

recipes.title: Margherita Pizza
recipes.description: Classic Italian pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
recipes.preparation: Spread sauce on dough. Add mozzarella. Bake at 220°C for 10–12 min. Garnish with basil and olive oil.
